slide.title: Tidying up your HTML

blurb.title: Why'd I show up to talk about tidy?

slide.blurb: Because Tidy is a really cool technology for today's dynamic web environment
What tidy can do for you:

list.bullet: Make your HTML Completely web-standards compliant automatically
Identify potential problems with your markup
Make your web sites load faster
Extract all of the URLs from any web page in 21 lines of code *without regular expressions*
Convert malformed HTML documents into XHTML 1.0 documents automatically
Never use a regular expression for screen scraping again
